messages.message:
in aihub.uat, when uploading files with the “Multi-Step Reasoning set”,  getting the following error:
```"msg": "All records had a runtime exception, last error observed: Error executing Map UDF step post_reader_map_udf. Reason: Exception calling function - create_index: Indexing failed with error: Internal error during create_index_per_document. Check the logs for more details.. Defined in post_reader_map_udf.udf/script.py (line 66)

Traceback:
  File "post_reader_map_udf.udf/script.py", line 66, in create_index
",```
Works when I disable the setting.
